description: Amendments to planning permission dated 17 November 2021 (RN: 21/03064/FULL) for, 'Erection of a replacement building over enlarged lower ground floor, ground floor and first and second floor level, with a two-storey closet wing to the rear at lower ground and ground floor level, for use as a single-family dwelling (Class C3). Creation of terrace at rear second floor level. Installation of PVs at main roof level and plant within an acoustic screen at rear ground floor level'; NAMELY, to revise the description of development to: 'Demolition of existing building and erection of a replacement building over enlarged lower ground floor, ground floor and first and second floor level, with a two-storey closet wing to the rear at lower ground and ground floor level, for use as a single-family dwelling (Class C3). Creation of terrace at rear second floor level. Installation of PVs at main roof level and plant within an acoustic screen at rear ground floor level'.
